Department of Computer Science & Engineering is organizing a workshop on IoT-applications, Technologies and Platforms: a Practical Approach. The workshop will be held at Hardware Lab of CSE Department from 12th to 13th November 2016. The workshop team is from Intel/FICE Bangalore. For registration, please visit the link- https://goo.gl/forms/H0pc4DLMhWOU0OUI2 .

Department of Computer Science & Engineering is organizing a workshop on Computer Networking and CCIE Security. This workshop focuses on security of computing systems and CCIE Security. This Cisco CCIE Security certification recognizes individuals who have expert-level knowledge and skills to implement, maintain, and support extensive Cisco Network Security Solutions using the latest Cisco Security products and security best practices. The workshop will be held from 22nd to 23rd October 2016 at Department of Computer Science & Engineering, IIT Patna. The workshop team is NSSIT, UAE/Inspire Cyber Solutions.

Four IMPRINT project proposals, involving CSE department faculties, have been accepted for funding. Notably only 10% of the submitted proposals have been finally selected in three stages over last six months. Our heartiest congratulations to Dr. Arijit Mondal, Dr. Asif Ekbal, Dr. Rajiv Misra and Prof. Pushpak Bhattacharyya on the selection of their IMPRINT project proposals. The title of the project proposals are as follows-

  • Title SmartWeather: Location based Deep weather event prediction using spatial big data computing (involving Dr. Rajiv Misra)
  • Title- Speech Based Patient Assistance System (involving Dr. Asif Ekbal and Prof. Pushpak Bhattacharyya)
  • Title- A Platform for Crosslingual and Multilingual Event Monitoring in Indian Languages (involving Dr. Asif Ekbal and Prof. Pushpak Bhattacharyya)
  • Title- A Software Tool for the Planning and Design of Smart Micro Power Grids (involving Dr. Arijit Mondal)

Department of Computer Science & Engineering, IIT Patna is organizing 6th International Symposium on Embedded Computing & System Design (ISED) with the help of Electrical Engineering Department from 15th to 17th December 2016. The details of the conference is available in http://www.ised2016.org/. It also includes a Grand Challenge project contest in the area of Smart Embedded Applications & IoT. The prize money for the winner is Rs 1 lakh. For more details, you can visit to Grand Challenge tab of  http://www.ised2016.org/.
